name: Basic Membership
features: Access to gym facilities during off-peak hours
Limited access to group fitness classes
Discounts at the gym pro shop

name: Premium Membership
features: Access to all group fitness classes
Discounts at the gym pro shop

name: Family Membership
features: Unlimited access to gym facilities for 2 adults and 2 children
Access to all group fitness classes for the family
4 personal trainer sessions per month (2 for each adult)
